item.title: [317] [delta] cannot delete certain objects
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

its because deleteobject only deletes things from tiletype 9-11 i believe

you will have to makeglobalobject

on that spot and figure out what floor type it is…

item.title: [317] [delta] cannot delete certain objects
item.dc:creator: @daemonic123 daemonic123
item.description:
@daemonic123 wrote:

I am struggling with deleting certain objects, other objects fountains,trees delete, but not these.
I am currently using the deletethatobject function here’s code:

public void deletethatobject(int objectX, int objectY) { ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 10); } public void Deleteobjects() { deletethatobject(2825, 9810); }

the pillar-things have no identity if you try to right click; simply act as obstacle. the alter is identified as “altar slab”

here’s a screenshot of the objects i wish to delete:

objects.png799×449
